early_years.question_text: Who discovered the law of gravity?
Which scientist is credited with the discovery of penicillin?
What did Wilhelm Conrad Roentgen discover in 1895?
Who proposed the heliocentric theory of the solar system?
Who discovered the circulation of blood in the human body?
Which scientist discovered that the Earth revolves around the Sun?
Who is known as the father of modern chemistry?
Who built the first successful airplane?
Who invented the World Wide Web?
Who invented the elevator (with safety device)?
Who is the founder of SpaceX?
Who developed the first artificial heart?
Which company developed the first electric car in mass production?
Who invented the World Wide Web browser 'Mosaic'?
What year was the first iPhone released?
Who is known as the father of the personal computer?
Who invented the first mobile phone?
Which company launched the first smartwatch?

options.text: Joseph Priestley and Carl Wilhelm Scheele

early_years.question_text: Who developed the periodic table of elements?
Who developed the theory of relativity?
Who launched the first artificial satellite, Sputnik 1?
